marklogic.body: So if Paulino is now the backup, any ides on who will be coming the 40 man roster to make room for him? In fact, we'll need 2 moves since it looks like Nick Johnson's going to make the team. I think the waiver claim of Wheeler yesterday and the need for space on the 40 says that Josh bell is Off. As for the other needed Spot, I'd imagine that's where the trade will come into play. Perhaps Gregg will be traded or released to make room.
